title: Changes package structure
message:
Changes package structure

Groups all activity-related classes into "ui" package

title: Improves ScheduleList (defending against concurrent updates, faster search)
message:
Improves ScheduleList (defending against concurrent updates, faster search)

Currently, all use of ScheduleList is on the main thread. So, locking is
removed; defending against concurrent updates to warn early if that
expectation ever changes. If it does, improve ScheduleList to deal with it.

Search for position to insert/move items to is now via binary search, not
linear.

title: Fixes schedule activity (CollapsingToolbarLayout may stay collapsed)
message:
Fixes schedule activity (CollapsingToolbarLayout may stay collapsed)

CollapsingToolbarLayout does not play well when the recyclerview
has height wrap_content - if list becomes short while CTL is collapsed,
there will be no more scroll events, so CTL won't uncollapse.
